Question: Leno was higher than this person on that poll three times during the same period, in 1998, 2007, and 2008.
Hints: This person was a pit reporter for ABC in the 1971 Indianapolis 500.
A self-described average student, this person later endowed a scholarship for what he called "C students" at Ball State.
This person interviewed Mario Andretti, who had just crashed out of the race.
